data.comment: The match is underway. Nottingham have kicked-off.
Nottingham's Yuri Ribeiro has been booked in Nottingham.
In the minute 42, Harlee Dean (Birmingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first-half has come to a close in Nottingham.
Birmingham kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Gary Gardner is replacing Alen Halilovic for Birmingham at City Ground.
Nottingham make their first substitution with Anthony Knockaert replacing Sammy Ameobi.
Chris Hughton (Nottingham) is making a second substitution, with Lyle Taylor replacing Samba Sow.
In the minute 64, Lewis Grabban is booked for the home team.
The home team have replaced Alexander Mighten with Joe Lolley. This is the third substitution made today by Chris Hughton.
Maxime Colin for Birmingham has been booked by Jeremy Simpson and receives a first yellow card.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Lukas Jutkiewicz is replacing Scott Hogan for Birmingham at City Ground.
Ryan Yates (Nottingham) has received a first yellow card.
Lukas Jutkiewicz is on a sub for Scott Hogan for Birmingham.
